categories: Category:Star Wars Insider Special Edition 2014 articles

nodes.text: "Speak Like a Sith" was an article in Star Wars Insider 134. It explored the creation of a Sith conlang that was used in Book of Sith: Secrets from the Dark Side. This four-page article featured a brief linguistic description of the Sith language and one of its written form, the Kittât. It was later reprinted in Star Wars Insider Special Edition 2014.
